Title: The Weeping Somnambulist
Writer: Ty Franck (based on the novels by), Daniel Abraham (based on the novels by), Mark Fergus (developed by), Hawk Ostby (developed by), Hallie Lambert (written for television by), Georgia Lee (story editor)
Actors: Steven Strait, Cas Anvar, Dominique Tipper, Wes Chatham
Plot: Bobbie becomes a pawn in a struggle between Earth and Mars.
